name: Wizards' Gathering
description:
It's my first Ren'py visual novel. It should suffice to understand... the quality.

No, kidding. I started this visual novel for Nanoreno 2017. It's a story I'd planned in my heart since I was in my teens, although it underwent a lot of changes since those times. Now it deals with heavy themes and a lot of seriousness. But it's lighthearted. It's difficult to explain but basically, it's the story of a pro gamer, her troubles and how she ended up becoming homeless. It's the story of a frustrated sales clerk at Gamepot aswell, who meets the weird girl aforementioned and these two end up becoming friends.

It's really difficult to explain.

Although it's still in early development stages (3 chapters out of 10, not to mention the bad endings etc.) I do expect to finish it and since it's all planned, hopefully I'll see y'all enjoying it ~ <3
